author: COMSOL
description: This example uses the Charged Particle Tracing interface to compute the trajectories of electrons in a spatially varying magnetic field. The focusing effect of the magnetic field on the electron beam is analyzed further by computing the emittance along the beam trajectory.
label: magnetic_lens.mph
name: root

settings.description: Use robust geometry analysis method (requires a complete circle)
settings.name: AltCircular

settings.description: Check applicability of features in study

settings.name: UsePPR

settings.name: StoreExtra

settings.description: Maximum number of consecutive null collisions
settings.name: MaxNullCollision

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior

description: Initial values of variables solved for
